abstract: Medtronic’s Sprint Fidelis lead was recalled two years ago but remains in place for thousands of patients.
snippet: Medtronic’s Sprint Fidelis lead was recalled two years ago but remains in place for thousands of patients.
lead_paragraph: A widely used heart device recalled two years ago by Medtronic may be failing in patients at a rate significantly higher than previously known, a new report by two prominent cardiac specialists indicated.

headline.main: Study Finds More Failure of Heart Device
headline.print_headline: Study Finds More Failure of Heart Device
